long_description: Treat your feet to the lightweight and comfortable Sanuk Athena Shoes for your casual outings. Built with sandal footbeds, canvas uppers and cotton canvas linings, the Athena is part of Sanuk's Sidewalk Surfer line. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. EVA midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soft EVA footbeds feature AEGIS(R) antimicrobial additive to help deter odors. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Treat your feet to the lightweight and comfortable Sanuk Athena Shoes for your casual outings.
